attributes.description:
The Ford EcoSport is a solid compact SUV, and remains a popular choice. What makes the EcoSport a great all-rounder, is that it has decent ground clearance and compact dimensions, allowing for easy entry and exit, as well as tackling those gravel roads with ease. The EcoSport is powered by Ford’s four time award winning 1.0T turbo engine, providing outstanding performance and fuel consumption.  In this Titanium Spec, the EcoSport is equipped with all the bells and whistles, like semi-leather interior, climate control, cruise control, PDC front and rear, and even satellite navigation to mention a few. 

Balance of Ford’s 4 year / 120’000km warranty.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

It Has Covered 106 000 km. Amazing Features Include Front And Rear Park Distance Control, LED High Performance Lights, Cruise Control, Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Bluetooth, CD Player, 2 USB Ports, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 17 Inch Alloy Wheels. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

attributes.description: At chat2cars, We pride ourselves in reliable affordable Cars. Where we provide all variety of cars, from low budget/economy cars to classy /Luxurious cars, at the most affordable price compared to any other car site or car dealer. We pride ourselves in customer satisfaction. We also do not just sell cars, we care about cars, and we provide a 360 security measure around cars, Hence we provide Tracking devices that enables you to switch on or off your car using any phone. We have vast experience in the automobile industry and we guarantee that our staffs are professional and all our cars go through DEKRA inspection before delivery is done. visit us today at 93 Grayston drive Sandton City, Johannesburg. for that dream car.

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
KIA DEALER OF THE YEAR - 2022
We the Kia Konfidence Edenvale team pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our esteemed clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-workshop inspection check as well as DEKRA roadworthy and condition report before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles delivered have a full-service history and are accident free. We infuse ourselves with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. At Kia Edenvale we will also tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your budget as well. We also offer finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal possible. CALL US NOW and one of our experienced Kia Konfidence Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your Vehicle dreams come TRUE.
